title: Rapid-Test Supplies Are Tight as Biden Administration Orders More
sub_head: U.S. can process about 600 million Covid-19 tests a month, experts say
body:
The Biden administrationâ€™s plan to mail out 500 million Covid-19 tests is likely to put increased pressure on strained testing supplies as the Omicron variant spreads and people gather for the holidays.
The U.S. can currently process a total of about 600 million laboratory and rapid tests a month, said Mara Aspinall, co-founder of the Biomedical Diagnostics program at Arizona State University and board member of rapid-test maker Orasure Technologies Inc.
